attributes.action: Take action against those who discriminate and associate muslims with terrorism
attributes.additional_details: I am a muslim to yet i do not wear a hijab or scraf but Incidents are very common especially with muslims in scarfs and hijabs. I think this is a form of bullying too and it needs to be controlled now before matters get worse and people start taking situations in their own hands. IT IS NOT ok to bully or terrorise someone for others people actions. IT IS NOT acceptable to tolerate discrimination and IT IS NOT ok to feel like a stranger in a country where your born have family and friends.
attributes.background:
This is a very close family friends story and other incidents are out there too!!!
She was bullied in public for being a terrorist just because she's a muslim and wear's a scraf. 
I have stopped feeling this is my country and it is safe. Freedom is going as i feel Muslims are always being judged.
